criteria.name: three_sections_present
criteria.description: Report contains all three sections: what_changed, focus_today, decisions_needed

criteria.name: narrative_tts_ready
criteria.description: Narrative is 200-300 words, no markdown formatting, short sentences suitable for TTS

criteria.name: sources_consulted
criteria.description: At least 3 different source reports consulted (events, portfolio, network, etc.)

criteria.name: brevity_enforced
criteria.description: Max 3 items in what_changed, max 2 in focus_today, max 2 in decisions_needed

criteria.name: staleness_flagged
criteria.description: If source data is older than 3 days, report explicitly notes it

criteria.name: no_placeholders
criteria.description: No TODO, TBD, PLACEHOLDER, or template brackets in output
